properties.entry: SELECT BOARD_NO, BOARD_TITLE, CREATE_DATE, READ_COUNT, MEMBER_NM, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM REPLY WHERE REPLY.BOARD_NO = BOARD.BOARD_NO) AS "REPLY_COUNT" FROM BOARD JOIN MEMBER USING(MEMBER_NO) ORDER BY BOARD_NO DESC
SELECT B.*, M.MEMBER_NM FROM BOARD B JOIN MEMBER M ON(B.MEMBER_NO = M.MEMBER_NO) WHERE BOARD_NO = ?
SELECT R.*, M.MEMBER_NM FROM REPLY R JOIN MEMBER M ON (R.MEMBER_NO = M.MEMBER_NO) WHERE BOARD_NO = ? ORDER BY REPLY_NO
UPDATE BOARD SET READ_COUNT = READ_COUNT+1 WHERE BOARD_NO = ?
UPDATE BOARD SET BOARD_TITLE = ?, BOARD_CONTENT = ? WHERE BOARD_NO = ?
UPDATE REPLY SET REPLY_CONTENT = ? WHERE REPLY_NO = ?
UPDATE REPLY SET REPLY_CONTENT = ? WHERE REPLY_NO = ?
INSERT INTO BOARD VALUES (SEQ_BOARD_NO.NEXTVAL, ?, ?, DEFAULT, DEFAULT, ?)
SELECT BOARD_NO, BOARD_TITLE, CREATE_DATE, READ_COUNT, MEMBER_NM, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM REPLY WHERE REPLY.BOARD_NO = BOARD.BOARD_NO) AS "REPLY_COUNT" FROM BOARD JOIN MEMBER USING (MEMBER_NO)
